channel.title: Axoloti Core PCB diagram
channel.description:
I seem to remember Johanne releasing a diagram of the core board with enough info on it to allow us to design enclosures etc. After a complete search failure I can't find it and I'm forced to ask (sorry).
1) Can someone point me to it?
2) Does it have the pin gap spacing on it? I want to order some pin combs to solder in the GPIO.

item.title: Axoloti Core PCB diagram
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Knob/Button PCB Shield

Here's an Eagle BRD with the mechanically relevant parts axocore_v11_mech.brd (104.9 KB) I believe this contains everything you'd need to design extension boards.

Read full topic
